data.actual_result: Only `invalid-channel` is exported, which is inconsistent because both strings are used in the same context (aka invalid mentions)
data.expected_result: Both `invalid-channel` and `invalid-user` should be exported to Crowdin so they are available for all languages
data.short_description: Unlike `invalid-channel`, the string `invalid-user` isn't available in other languages than English.
data.steps_to_repro: - This bug technically affects all clients since it's about missing string exports on Crowdin, but the bug is only observable on Android because of https://trello. com/c/2BskgKam/ - Make sure you're using a language different than English - Find an invalid channel mention. Notice it's translated - Find an invalid user mention. Notice it isn't translated - You can also go to Crowdin and notice that `invalid-channel` is present but not `invalid-user`
